# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(str::String, text_width::Int = 10)
    lines = []
    for i in eachindex(str)
        if (i == endof(str)) || (i + text_width <= endof(str))
            push!(lines, str[i:(i + text_width - 1)])
        else
            append!(lines, last(lines); join=true)
            push!(lines, "\n")
            str = substr(str, i + text_width)
        end
    end
    return join(lines; with="\n")
end
```

Example usage:

```julia
wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines") # Output should be something like "This function will\nwrap words into lines"
```
